name: White and Silver Lace and Taffeta With Swarovski Crystal Princess Ball Gown & 16' Trail
description:
Size 0-6

Made of white and silver threaded alencon lace and French taffeta.

Adorned with Swarovski crystal appliqués.

Consisting of 3 pieces: 
-Ball Gown

-16 foot, detachable Watteau train that can be used as a traditional train from the waist

-Bolero jacket with flowing French sleeves, adorned with Swarovski crystal appliqués

Made by: Gideon Christopher
